data.value: You can cancel your trip up to 48 hours before the hour of departure. The value you paid will be transformed into credit to spend on future trips.

data.name: Confirm_Invite_Description
data.value:
Book your seat on an eight-seat transfer driven by a professional driver
and enjoy a stop-free trip with wifi on board at the price of a train ticket.

data.name: Confirm_Invite_Title
data.value: Invite your friends and travel for just €1.
data.comment: Mantemos "amigos"? @ lorena, sim acho que devemos manter amigos. "colegas" em vez de amigos parece-me demasiado impessoal

data.name: Help_Topic_Careers_Question_HowTo
data.value: How can I drive a YoyoLoop?

data.name: Help_Topic_Careers_Question_HowTo_Answer
data.value: Our team is growing! If you want to join our team, please send your CV to careers@YoyoLoop.com

data.name: Help_Topic_Corporate_Question_CorporatePricing
data.value: Do you have special prices for companies?

data.name: Help_Topic_Corporate_Question_TotalSpending
data.value: Can I know how much I spent in total?

data.name: Help_Topic_DiscountAndPromo_Question_PromoAndMGM
data.value: How can I book €1 trips and how can I apply a promo code?

data.name: Help_Topic_DiscountAndPromo_Question_TwoPromocodes
data.value: Can I use two promo codes for the same trip?

data.name: Help_Topic_DiscountAndPromo_Question_TwoPromocodes_Answer
data.value: No. Each promo code can only be used for one trip.

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_FriendsBenefits
data.value: What do my friends earn for booking with my promode?

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_GiftToYoyoUsers
data.value: Can I share my promo codes with friends who have already used YoyoLoop?
data.comment: Esta pergunta/resposta é um pouco confusa. Fará mais sentido dizer "Não. Os seus códigos promocionais apenas podem ser aplicados na primeira viagem de um utilizador."

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_GiftToYoyoUsers_Answer
data.value: No. Each friend you share your promo code with can only use it once.

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_HowManyFriends
data.value: How many friends can I invite?

data.name: Help_Topic_Invite_Question_Share
data.value: Where can I share my promo code?

data.name: Help_Topic_Luggage_Question_CanIBring
data.value: Can I bring luggage with me?

data.name: Help_Topic_Luggage_Question_CanIBring_Answer
data.value: Yes, as long as they are within YoyoLoop's baggage limits.

data.name: Help_Topic_Luggage_Question_NotAllowed
data.value: What can't I bring with me?

data.name: Help_Topic_Partners_Question_HowTo
data.value: How can I become a YoyoLoop partner?

data.name: Help_Topic_UserDashboard_Question_WhatCanIDo
data.value: What can I do with my YoyoLoop profile?

data.name: HomePage_MainTitle
data.value: Get rid of your car and enjoy your travel time while working or relaxing.
data.comment: @lorena - esta frase é super importante - sugestºoes welcome. Alterei para dar mais destaque ao substituição do carro e menos destaque a boleias. "Deixe o carro em casa e viaje num transfer de luxo ao preço do comboio"??

data.name: HomePage_SubTitle
data.value: Book your seat on a luxury van driven by a professional driver and enjoy a non-stop trip, with free wifi and at the same price as the train.
data.comment: @Lorena - também é super importante- vale a penapensares sobre isto e enviares-me sugestões para discutirmos

data.name: HomePage_SuggestLoop_Text
data.value:
Want YoyoLoop to give you a ride to your city?
Suggest a loop and keep a lookout for news!

data.name: HomePage_WhereToGo
data.value: Where do you want to go?

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Accessible_Content
data.value: You can save up to 75% by taking a Loop from YoyoLoop instead of taking you own car, and you get a much more enjoyable trip.

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Convenient_Content
data.value: YoyoLoop has frequent departures and near door-to-door service, with 10 access points in Lisbon and in Porto, connecting directly the city centers, main office areas and shopping malls.

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Convenient_SubTitle
data.value:
Convenient
pick up and drop off

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Reliable_Content
data.value: A professional driver will prick you up at pre-set place and departure time. All you have to do is to choose you departure point, book your trip and use your reserved seat.

data.name: HomePage_Why_Card_Sustainable_Content
data.value: All our trips are done with 8 seat luxury vans. We take cars of the motorways and thus reduce the carbon footprint of these inter-city Loops.

data.name: HomePage_Why_Title
data.value: Why should you travel with YoyoLoop?

data.name: HomePage_Yoyoloop_MainDescription
data.value: The only inter-city mobility option that is a real alternative to individual car, train and plane.

data.name: HomePage_Yoyoloop_SubDescription
data.value: Train stations and airports are a terrible experience and taking your own car is expensive and tiring. With a YoyoLoop luxury van, you can go to Lisbon, Oporto, Coimbra or Leiria and enjoy a non-stop trip while working or relaxing.

data.name: StaticPages_About_MainDescription
data.value: Disruptin inter-city mobility, one Loop at a time.

data.name: StaticPages_About_Shuttles_SubTitle
data.value: Our shuttles are all luxury 8 seat vans from Mercedes Benz (V-class Avantgarde, with leather seats). We have free wifi and a modern luxury interior and a professional driver that you enjoy the full length of your tip.

data.name: StaticPages_About_SubDescription
data.value:
Yoyoloop has the ambition of revolutionizing intercity mobility. We believe they should amount to more than traffic jams, rush hour and parking lots.

It is precisely why we created a luxury mobility service as an alternative to trains and traditional car rides, with the difference of being more accessible, convenient, reliable and sustainable. Our luxury vans have wifi on board and are driven by professional drivers to ensure a more useful and comfortable journey. For the good of our cities.

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Accessible_Content
data.value: You can save up to 75% by taking a Loop from YoyoLoop instead of taking you own car, and you get a much more enjoyable trip.

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Convenient_Content
data.value: YoyoLoop has frequent departures and near door-to-door service, with 10 access points in Lisbon and in Porto, connecting directly the city centers, main office areas and shopping malls.

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Convenient_SubTitle
data.value:
Convenient
pick up and drop off

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Reliable_Content
data.value: A professional driver will prick you up at pre-set place and departure time. All you have to do is to choose you departure point, book your trip and use your reserved seat.

data.name: StaticPages_About_Why_Sustainable_Content
data.value: All our trips are done with 8 seat luxury vans. We take cars of the motorways and thus reduce the carbon footprint of these inter-city Loops.

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_MainTitle
data.value:
Disrupting inter-city mobility,
one Loop at a time

data.name: StaticPages_Loops_SubDescription
data.value: YoyoLoop has Loops available between Lisbon and Oporto, Coimbra and Leiria.
